title: November Cotton Flower - purpose of lines 1-8 is

content.question: The primary purpose of lines 1-8 ("Boll-weevil's...ground") is to

choices.label: provide a context for the poem’s central image
undermine the credibility of the speaker

content.answer: provide a context for the poem’s central image

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
